com.viaoa.sync.remote

Class RemoteSyncImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.sync.remote.RemoteSyncImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteSyncInterface

    public class RemoteSyncImpl
extends Object
implements RemoteSyncInterface
    Remote broadcast methods used to keep OAObjects, Hubs in sync with all computers. Note: there is an instance on the server and on each client. The server needs to always try to update, even if the object is no longer in memory, then it will need to get from datasource.
